values:
do you have any clue what it is like to be so afraid to feel?  to be so afraid to show emotions or open yourself up for someone.  its like you are putting your life in their hands.  im just terrified of being hurt again.  im so afraid to feel what is in my heart and to acknowledge it.  im so in it deep its sick.  if you put all the other guys together they wouldnt add up to what i feel now.... not even what i thought i felt for roger.  Im so afraid of losing him.  im all across the board and it sucks that im thinking in the way that im going to lose him and that i have to enjoy everything while it lasts.  ugh.  if there were just a way to know.  and i want to tell him, "if you know you are going to hurt me or break my heart tell me to hit the road now because i dont think i could handle that again."  and you know how they say you know then the person is THE ONE.  well i know it and it hurts.  the first person that comes along and we were friends first and he respects me and has never given me a reason to doubt him... i would drop everything for him... and 5 years down the road and we arent together but he comes to me and says he wants me i would drop it all and run back to him, i could care less if he were a bum and i were a lawyer or whateve3r the case may be.  love has no barriers.  i dont know what to listen to anymore.  my hormones are killing me.  he doesnt know what i would do just to hold him.. i hate that i dont get to see him everyday.  but when it comes down to it i know that i am the one sleeping so close to him on the weekends that i can feel his heat and all i have to do is roll over to see his face or catch him looking at me.  it could be 95 degrees outside and just one look at him and i can get the chills.  my feelings are so deep.  i honestly think that we were meant to be i just wish i could be normal and have patience to wait it all out.  or that things would go a little faster.  i mean i dont think things can go faster than they did but thats a whole different story.  and if he doesnt think we are going to be together then he shouldnt tell me that little things like getting the mail spark thoughts of what it would be like to be married to me or that he sat with my mom and thought wow one day that is going to be his mother in law.  the horrible part is that i know i am one jealous possessive vengefull bitch.  girls past present and future beware.  god please grant me the serenity and patience do deal with this because i think my head and heart are going to simultaniously combust just thinking about it.  he is so different than what i am used to.  HES ITALIAN number 1 lol.  and no he isnt a tan blue eyed colombian with big lips. wow that is sooo over.  i mean it sickens me that i couldnt even imagine myself with anyone else i dont even look.  all i can hope for is a happy future for him.  oh shit im going to cry so i better stop no0w.

i love you
http://mio-cuore.livejournal.com/10476.html
Ok so its Sunday.... I was supposed to get my period YESTERDAY! and i havent gotten it yet, = THIS SUCKS!  SO yeah anyways lol... GUIDANCE WOULD BE NICE LOL!
http://mio-cuore.livejournal.com/9855.html

So everything is going great.  I think I might be getting a key to someones house lol.. but anyways last night Giuseppe and I went out to eat with Ben, Jessica, Biana, and Phil.  We went to a place called Sea in Willamsburg.  I went and lost my cell phone in the crowd of peopple drinking and dancing around.  So Jessica and i went and re-traced all of our steps looking for it and there was no phone.  So Giuseppe and I go to the car and whatta ya know ITS NOT THEIR EITHER!  i was so cold that when we were walking back he put his arm around me and was like aww my poor baby is colllddddd... so we go back in and im flipping out because its a new cell phone but i knew that i was going to get over it.  So we all go to walk outside to my chain smoker friends can smoke and he's holding on to me the whole time.  So our number comes up after waiting for a year and half and as we are walking to the table Giuseppe goes and asks the bartender if anyone turned in a phone and whatta ya know HE HAS IT!  i gave giuseppe the biggest hug in the damn world i was so happy to have my phone back.  So we all go sit down and all of a sudden this girl throws herself on giuseppe and started calling him sexy we were all like who is this drunk lady lol and when she stood up it was his sister!!!!!!! lol.... talk about cracking me up.  We had the best food ever!  in between feeding eachother giuseppe was abusing the staff.  Jessica said to me that him and i need to sit down and talk because we need to figure everything out.  I personally like the way things are going.  I would love more in the means of a title but im the type that if i think that mentioning something will make things weird or shit like that, my mouth will be shut so tight air couldnt get through.  We got back to my school at almost 3 am.  i was so tired i just knocked the fcuk out.

Next weekened Im going into brooklyn and Jessica and I are going to get our nails and hair done... WOOO HOOOOO!!!!!! GIRLS DAY!  I think im going to get layers again. who knows.  But shhh im not telling too many people because then it wont be a suprise.. im one of those fcuktards that likes to go do stuff and have it be a suprise.  I hope things keep moving smoothly they way they have been.  I'm happy despite my emotional couple of days this past week.
http://mio-cuore.livejournal.com/9719.html

OK so i am what you could call somewhat happier.  I love how he calls me 
and I dont have to call him... Its sick though how when i hear that damn ringtone 
my heart flips about in my chest.  Tomorrow we are going out with his other 
friends to some restraunt in Williamsburg.  I also love how it was his freidn 
JESSICA who invited me.  Shes the best I love her.  I swear if it wasnt for her 
being up here i would be lost.  Its good having a girl nearby,  Next weekend 
is girls weekend... while her boyrfriend and my corazon de melon work at their 
pizzerias we are going to get our nails and hair done.  haha kinda remind you 
of two married couples.  well i can say that we are the nagging women in the 
salon.... Things were a lot better today... but yeah ugh... i need a fucking CAR!  
if i dont get one im going to cause a hemmorhage in my body somewhere from 
holding my breath too damn long lol.
http://mio-cuore.livejournal.com/9355.html

The best things to write about are what hurs you most and the people who hurt you.  Not only them but the ones who are there for you.

ALPHA ORDER!!!!

1. Dillon- Well hes a lil too young but hes a sweetheart when he wants to be~  He gives me attention and i like it... only when its convenient for me tho... there isnt much to say about him besides the fact that he has KILLER lips and a nice bubble butt!!!!

2. Giuseppe- Well i could write a saga on this guy.  Hes such an awsome friend i love him to death!!!! Im really gunna need him when im up in New York.  But i really dont talk to him as often as id like.  Hes always sooo damn busy and that sucks.  hes so cute too.... hehe

3. Jasson- Hes my bestest and i know i can tell him everything but it just really sucks how he cuts me off whenever i go to mention his cousin.... im gunna miss this kid a lot but i mean damn if he keeps cuttin me off im gunna flip.... hes gunna have to realize that no matter what he says or what he does im still going to have the feelings i do... He says he doesnt kno what hes going to do without me but i think he will make out juuust peachy!

4. ~*Lisa*~ MY BEST IN THE WHOLEWorld!!!!  You are my everything and i dont know where i would be without you... no matter the time or where i am i know i can call you and ill get a call back asap whether im crying or laughing my ass off or you care to share your nights of debauchery with me!... AINT NO MOUNTAIN HIGH ENOUGH AINT NO VALLEY LOW ENOUGH!!!! you know its true.  always the same guys right lili? from shirley temples to lisa 32 hands!!! hahaha~ DAMN COLOMBIANS!!!

5. Roger- its hard to write this but i think he was my first love even though maybe i wasnt that to him... i miss him more than anyone could imagine.  ihate how everyday i sit back and he crosses my mind at least once and it hurst sooooooo damn bad... i just want all the pain to end and just leave me with the smile i used to have before you tore my world into a millon and one pieces.. there is so much more i can say but lisa already knows!

6. Santiago- NO FUCKING COMMENT!

Well i am babysitting right now and i wish i was in Tallahassee with my cousin.... i want to be there for her because i love her more than anything.  My sister is really starting to flip out about me going to college... i cant wait its going to be the experience of a lifetime~

<font size="5">

Dear Girls (from us guys)...
Don't assume that guys won't care where you are, because we do.
It makes us feel secure to know that our girlfriends aren't off flirting with guys we've never heard of.
Also, don't talk about your ex-boyfriends.
We never have, nor ever will respect or like them, nor do we want to hear about them.
When you do, you're asking your boyfriend to be jealous.
You're asking your boyfriend to lose trust.
On that, don't hump everything that walks into the room.
We don't care if you talk to other guys.
We don't care if you're friends with other guys.
But when you're sitting next to us, and some random guy walks into the room and you jump up and tackle him, without even introducing us, yeah, it pisses us off.
It doesn't help if you sit there and talk to him for ten minutes without even acknowledging the fact that we're still there.
Also, when we tell you you're pretty/ beautiful/ gorgeous/ cute/ stunning, we freaking mean it.
Don't tell us we're wrong.
We'll stop trying to convince you.
The sexiest thing about a girl is confidence.
Yeah, you can quote me.
Don't be mad when we hold the door open.
Smile and say "thank you."
Let us pay for you.
Don't "feel bad."
We enjoy doing it.
It's expected.
Smile and say - everybody together now - "thank you."
Kiss us when no one's watching.
If you kiss us when you know nobody's looking we'll be more impressed.
You don't have to get dressed up for us.
If we're going out with you in the first place, you don't have to feel the need to wear the shortest skirt you have, put on every kind of makeup you own.
We like you for WHO you are and not WHAT you are.
Don't flirt with guys when we're not around.
We'll find out. Trust us.
We have eyes everywhere.
And when we find out, we're pissed.
Not necessarily with the guys you flirted with, more-so with you.
Don't take everything we say seriously.
Sarcasm is a beautiful thing. See the beauty in it.
Don't get angry easily.
Stop using magazines/media as your bible.
Don't talk about how hot Tom Cruise or Brad Pitt is in front of us.
It's boring, and we don't care.
You have girlfriends for that.
Whatever happened to the word "handsome"?
Why does everything have to be "hot/sexy"?
I'd be utterly stunned by a girl who greeted me with "Hey handsome!" instead of "Hey baby/ stud/ cutie/ sexy" or whatever else you can think of.
Claiming girls or guys to be "hot" shows immaturity.
Girls, I cannot stress this enough: if you aren't being treated right by a guy, don't wait for him to change.
Ditch his sorry, disgrace-to-the-male-population ass, and find someone who will treat you with utter respect.
Someone who will honor your morals.
Someone who will make you smile when you're at your lowest.
http://mio-cuore.livejournal.com/2921.html

<center> I was just looking at a bunch of pictures and thinking about a lot of memories~ I was once in love and i no longer cry about it.  Then i have been sitting here thinking about my crazy cousin who i love so much.  Im so happy that shes having fun.  i think im changing.  i just cant believe im moving in august and its finally starting to hit me and i just want to cry because im nervous and im scared im going to lose the ties i have with Jessica, Andrea, Santiago and many more people.  I know i wont be able to get rid of lisa~ HAHA JK!  I miss Giuseppe and i havent talked to him in over a month and a half and it sucks because when hes here we chill and have fun then the second he leaves its all over AGAIN!  Io non ho capito perche io sono pazza~ i want so much outta life but the scary part is that all i really want is a husband and kids~  if a select few ppl were to get down on one knee and ask me to marry them i would say yes in a heart beat... then we would make beautiful italian babys~ lol~ im nuts i know~

Well a chapter has ended and a new one is begining! I am officially done with R.R. i wish no never see his face for as long as i live and i know its possible! Im stronger than to allow him to screw up my life anymore than he has already! I am so much stronger and better than to allow someone to rule my life when they do nothing but bring me down in every possible way. true friends dont do that to eachother i dont care what you say. but anyways... THATS RIGHT IM GOING DECEMBER 15th!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! its such a rewarding feeling to know that you arent benig held back by anything LIFE IS GOOD! all i gotta remember is both LIFE AND LOVE GO ON!! And on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and love goes on and on and on and life goes on and on and on When I was with you I was always happy and I Drempt of promises you made to me Now I see you holding hands with another girl and I I cannot understand why you Would ever leave our love behind Love can set you free, sometimes its meant to be and love goes on and on and on and on and on and on and on Love can make you mine, sometimes its so unkind but life goes on and on and on and on and on and on and on And on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and love goes on and on and on and life goes on and on and on Maybe we're not meant to be together now I see Never be the one I love...forever It was not okay for you to be untrue and lie to me Dont think that you'll get another chance Cuz you've already lost the key Love can set you free, sometimes its meant to be and love goes on and on and on and on and on and on and on Love can make you mine, sometimes its so unkind but life goes on and on and on and on and on and on and on And on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and love goes on and on and on and life goes on and on and on
